name: Sound Slide
description: Sound Slide is a rythm puzzle racer, bringing you to 4 different environments around the world! Each environment has its own distinctive music: go with the flow and hop from lane to lane to get to the end!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD Turion X2/Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 900 MB available space
